summary: Making mushrooms glow, you, harvesting-lover, will find them easily.
descriptionHtml:
Easy To Find - Mushroom Glows


[color=#98d98e]
Optional File Available!
I added Canis Root, Nightshade, Giant Lichen and Slaughterfish Egg Nest.
[/color]

Will You Do Me A Favor?
======================
I want to see your \"Mushroom ScreenShot\" :D
If you don\'t mind, please upload your lovely mushroom image to \"Images From Users\".
I heard there are some \"Fairy Ring\" in Skyrim...but I found only one so far...


Description
===========
Making mushrooms glow, you, harvesting-lover, will find them easily.


Details
=======
Some mushrooms (Bleeding Crown, Blisterwort, Fly Amanita, 
Glowing Mushroom, Imp Stool, Mora Tapinella, Namira\'s Rot, White Cap) now will glow.
And when you harvest them, their glow disappears.


What It Does
=============
A simple and a little mesh tweak :)
I changed \"Emissive Color\" from black to gray, red, brown, and green.
And also changed \"Emissive Multiple\" from 1.0000 to 1.2000


Load Order
===========
There is no esps. So you don\'t have to worry about that :)


Known Issues or Bugs
====================
Some Mora Tapinellas...slight green glowing one, will not disappear when harvesting :(
I can\'t handle with it...Sorry.


Incompatibility
===============
None, I think.
Any texture replacers OK!
But in case of mushroom mesh replacers...I don\'t know whether it exists or not...maybe conflicts.


Planning
========
Canis Root, Nightshade, Slaughterfish Egg Nests, and Giant Lichen, I want to add.


Credits
=======
Author: AltheaR

Thanks to Bethesda
Thanks to skyrim.nexusmods.com
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.


Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod.
but all I ask in return is that you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod.


2012.6.21 AltheaR
author: AltheaR
